overview:
Jeremy Colless is Managing Director of Australian angel investment/early stage venture capital firm Proto Investment Partners.

Proto Investment Partners first fund, the Sydney Angels Sidecar Fund, is a $10 million investment fund that invests solely in early stage business ventures. The Fund invests alongside Sydney Angelsâ€™ members and in doing so greatly increases the chances of an investment round closing.

The Fund can also provide funding for follow on investment rounds. As the Fundâ€™s investors are diverse and typically well connected, entrepreneurs can also expect to benefit from the extended networks. The Fund expects to invest all of its available capital in Sydney based enterprises over the next 5 years.
